text: The Arab Bank was founded by Abdel Hamid Shoman in Jerusalem, Palestine in 1930. It started with seven shareholders with a value of 15,000 Palestinian pounds, and after more than 70 years, the bank became a global institution, with assets amounting to 27.31 billion dollars in 2005. Net profits amounted to $618 million for the first nine months of 2016. Its branches are spread over five continents around the world. The net profit reached $618 million in the first nine months of 2016 ==Related pages== *List of banks in Jordan ==References== == Other websites == * Arab Bank Jordan Category:Banks of Asia Category:1930 establishments in Asia Category:Companies of Jordan
title: Arab Bank
